metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8538 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
dwarf_leb.c in libdwarf allows attackers to cause a denial of service(SIGSEGV).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8538` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dwarfdump - 20120410-2+deb7u2build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '20120410-2+deb7u2build0.16.04.1').
